recipe_name: Blueberry, almond butter and cream pancakes
method: Whip the cream until soft peaks form when the whisk is removed. Dribble the almond butter and blueberry conserve over the pancakes. Top with dollops of whipped cream and enjoy!
ingredients: 100ml/3Â½fl oz double cream,  4-6 tbsp almond butter,  4 tbsp blueberry conserve,  4 pancakes, to serve
